mapper.select: SELECT i.inventoryCode, p.storedType, c.categoryMid, c.categorySub, p.productName, i.quantity FROM Inventory i JOIN Warehouse w ON i.warehouseCode = w.warehouseCode JOIN Product p ON i.productCode = p.productCode JOIN Category c ON p.categoryCode = c.categoryCode WHERE w.warehouseCode = #{warehouseCode}
